import { useContext } from 'react' import { Button } from '../navbar/Button' import { Context } from '../../context' import { StepOneHeader } from './StepOneHeader' import { StepOneInptutName } from './StepOneInputName' import { StepOneInputEmail } from './StepOneInputEmail' import { StepOneInputPhone } from './StepOneInputPhone' function StepOne() { const { inputName, inputEmail, inputPhone, setInputPhone, isValidPhoneNumber, setIsValidPhoneNumber, setStepOneCompleted, } = useContext(Context) if (inputName.length > 5 && inputEmail.length > 12 && inputPhone.length === 18) { setStepOneCompleted(true) } return (
) } export { StepOne }
